title: Share Market Highlights: Markets end marginally higher; Sensex closes at 85,265, Nifty at 26,034
description: Sensex, Nifty updates on 4 December 2025: Benchmark indices ended slightly higher on Thursday as investors stayed on the sidelines ahead of the Reserve Bank of India’s monetary policy outcome on Friday. The Sensex rose 158.51 points to close at ₹85,265.32, wh…
content:
• December 4, 2025 15:53The live blog is now closed
  • December 4, 2025 15:40CLOSING BELL: Sensex settled with 158.51 pts or 0.19% gains at 85,265.32, and Nifty 50 was up 47.75 pts … [+73073 chars]
